mapper.select: select id from oe_member where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into oe_member( id, group_id, role_id, password, email, name, birthday, job, address, mobile_phone, home_phone ) values( #{id}, #{group.id}, #{role.id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{job}, #{address}, #{mobilePhone}, #{homePhone} )
mapper.select: select id, password, email, name, birthday, job, address, mobile_phone, home_phone from oe_member member inner join oe_group group on member.group_id = group.id inner join oe_role role on member.role_id = role.id where member.id = #{id}

select --id, password, email, name, birthday, job, address, mobile_phone, home_phone, role_id, group_id from oe_member oemember inner join oe_group oegroup on oemember.group_id = oegroup.id inner join oe_role oerole on oemember.role_id = oerole.id
